system.description:
Your character is an ordained Rabbi, a teacher and wise man of the Jewish community. He is afforded the respect due from all within his community, who look to him for leadership and guidance.

As a rabbi, your character is expected to teach students, to study and write upon the law, and to pass judgment upon cases brought before the Jewish court. 

 

The rabbi must take the Educated (Hebrew) Virtue to provide the required Academic Abilities. This Virtue is only available to male characters.
